movement.default: select p.code as partnumber, p.product_name as product, mv.qty as qty, case when p.unit is null then '' else p.unit end as unit, case when mv.notes is null then '' else mv.notes end as batch_no from movement_view mv inner join product_view p on mv.product_code=p.code where mv.trans_code = @code order by mv.code

head.default: select t.code as transnumber, substr(cast(t.time_stamp as char(10)), 1, 10) as crdate, t.trans_date as transdate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.report_notes is null then '' else t.report_notes end as fnote, rt.code as ref_transnumber, c.customer_name as cust_name, (select zip_code from customer_addresses where code = c.code limit 1) as cust_zipcode, (select city from customer_addresses where code = c.code limit 1) as cust_city, (select street from customer_addresses where code = c.code limit 1) as cust_street, comp.customer_name as comp_name, case when comp.zip_code is null then '' else comp.zip_code end as comp_zipcode, case when comp.city is null then '' else comp.city end as comp_city, case when comp.street is null then '' else comp.street end as comp_street, pl.code as planumber, pl.place_name as warehouse from trans_view t inner join(select mv.trans_code, min(i.trans_code) as ref_trans_code, min(place_code) as place_code from movement mv inner join link l on l.link_code_1=mv.code and l.link_type_1 = 'LINK_MOVEMENT' and l.link_type_2 = 'LINK_ITEM' and l.deleted=false inner join item i on l.link_code_2=i.code and i.deleted=false where mv.deleted=false group by mv.trans_code) ref on ref.trans_code=t.code inner join trans rt on ref.ref_trans_code = rt.code inner join customer c on rt.customer_code = c.code inner join place pl on ref.place_code=pl.code, (select c.code, c.customer_name, ca.zip_code, ca.city, ca.street from customer c left join customer_addresses ca on ca.code=c.code where c.customer_type='CUSTOMER_OWN' limit 1) comp where t.code = @code
head.mssql: select t.code as transnumber, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), t.time_stamp, 120) as crdate, t.trans_date as transdate, case when t.notes is null then '' else t.notes end as notes, case when t.report_notes is null then '' else t.report_notes end as fnote, rt.code as ref_transnumber, c.customer_name as cust_name, (select zip_code from customer_addresses where code = c.code limit 1) as cust_zipcode, (select city from customer_addresses where code = c.code limit 1) as cust_city, (select street from customer_addresses where code = c.code limit 1) as cust_street, comp.customer_name as comp_name, case when comp.zip_code is null then '' else comp.zip_code end as comp_zipcode, case when comp.city is null then '' else comp.city end as comp_city, case when comp.street is null then '' else comp.street end as comp_street, pl.code as planumber, pl.place_name as warehouse from trans_view t inner join(select mv.trans_code, min(i.trans_code) as ref_trans_code, min(place_code) as place_code from movement mv inner join link l on l.link_code_1=mv.code and l.link_type_1 = 'LINK_MOVEMENT' and l.link_type_2 = 'LINK_ITEM' and l.deleted=false inner join item i on l.link_code_2=i.code and i.deleted=false where mv.deleted=false group by mv.trans_code) ref on ref.trans_code=t.code inner join trans rt on ref.ref_trans_code = rt.code inner join customer c on rt.customer_code = c.code inner join place pl on ref.place_code=pl.code, (select c.code, c.customer_name, ca.zip_code, ca.city, ca.street from customer c left join customer_addresses ca on ca.code=c.code where c.customer_type='CUSTOMER_OWN' limit 1) comp where t.code = @code

fieldvalue.default: select map_key as fielddef, map_value as value, map_type as notes from trans_map where code = @code
